title: Analying TFIDF biology corpus
description: This is my first script, I'm analyzing the biology corpus to extract tags using tfidf score, I increased the value for words that appear in the title, and I'm evaluating the output with the corpus tags, i got a low score: 0.073, I'm going to apply advanced techniques in order to increase the score.
